alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Franklin; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND WESTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Sunbury, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Westerville, Granville, Pataskala, Johnstown, Sunbury, Beechwood Trails, Granville South, New Albany, Jersey, Galena, Alexandria, Hartford and Center Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
